Articles.Content:
So, here's how it begins. I had not achieved orbit yet, just suborbital flights, and I wanted to achieve it this morning. I managed, using a two-stage liquid fuel rocket with the first stage engine being the 'Swivel', and the second stage engine being the 'Terrier.' I appointed Jeb as the pilot, firstly, because he is a true BadS, and second, because who else can you trust to be first in orbit? After a long, suspenseful, climb I made it to orbit, with fuel to spare. The Ap and Pe were there, and all was well. I started orbiting, doing some experiments and more on my Mercury II craft, the first one being the suborbital model. Then, as Pe was nearing and I was in full sunlight, I decided to make Jeb do an EVA, which would hopefully be like any other. That is where I was wrong. Very wrong. When he exited and let go, he accidentally hit the craft and sent it gyrating out of control. It wasn't too fast, nothing like the real life mission Gemini 8, but it was still bad. Activating the jetpack, I tried to get back, but did not manage, and soon, there was no more EVA propellant left. Thankfully, the Pe was higher than the re-entry point, so Jeb and Mercury II are in no danger. I have paused it now, being a little busy, but later on, I will heed some of the suggestions given to me and I will send an unmanned craft up with a module for Jeb to go in. With no RCS and everything, it will be difficult, but it can be done! I will make this a challenge later on. Stay tuned, updates will follow! ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Here's Jeb, a little too calm..

 ![screenshot1.png](http://s8.postimg.org/elw594ntx/screenshot1.png)

Haha, you have to love kerbal escapades. I had a similar problem orbiting the Mun, I had accidentally set the trim, so when I went EVA the craft started spinning really fast. Threw me off, I paused the game to figure out what was wrong, figured out how to kill the trim(I had a probe module on the craft as well), and managed to get Bob back, but it was pretty scary.

Best of luck ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Yes, you do! Interesting, I suppose you had better luck than I did, Jeb's not getting back to this ship.. I haven't even made it to the Mun yet. 

Thank you, Jeb needs luck right now! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

[closed]

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-04T19:47:23Z" title="07/04/2021 07:47  PM" data-short="3 yr">July 4, 2021</time> by benjiful9000**
I was thinking about that, it will be very difficult, but I will not give up! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Jeb will make it!

[closed]

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-04T19:47:13Z" title="07/04/2021 07:47  PM" data-short="3 yr">July 4, 2021</time> by benjiful9000**
Haha, for now I just want Jeb to be safe, I think I will do the empty capsule thing.

[closed]

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-04T19:46:52Z" title="07/04/2021 07:46  PM" data-short="3 yr">July 4, 2021</time> by benjiful9000**
Yeah, I will continue it soon.
I suppose throwing a Klaw into a cargo bay is out of the question?

Update: I tried to rendevous, but I am no good at that.. The end result was me reverting, sorry to say! Stay tuned for more, I think I will make a long report about my whole career! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[closed]

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-04T19:45:10Z" title="07/04/2021 07:45  PM" data-short="3 yr">July 4, 2021</time> by benjiful9000**
Ladders. Lots and lots of ladders.

This is how I returned a stranded Kerbal with no RCS fuel left back in 23.5 or so in my early days. It worked suprisingly well. Yes, way to much monoprop, but I was newb. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Though I was able to bring him down to the surface of Minmus where he could board a return-ship. Not sure how he would do on atmospheric re-entry while hanging on the claw.

![3OSdVCc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3OSdVCc.jpg)
